title: NFT Art Gallery
description: Build an NFT marketplace where artists can mint and sell their digital artwork. Implement features like auctions, direct sales, and royalties.

title: DeFi Dashboard
description: Create a decentralized finance (DeFi) dashboard that aggregates and displays user's investments across various DeFi platforms.

title: Decentralized Voting System
description: Develop a smart contract for a secure, transparent voting system to be used in local elections or community decisions.

title: Utility Token Launch
description: Design and deploy a new ERC-20 token for a specific utility within a decentralized platform, followed by an initial coin offering (ICO).

title: Custom Blockchain Explorer
description: Develop a blockchain explorer tool to view transaction histories and balances of addresses for a specific blockchain, enhancing transparency.
